attributes.action: Restrict Future Access to NHS Funded Treatments for Conditions Arising from Smoking
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The dangers of smoking have been well documented and publicised over the past 2 decades. Every year £millions are being disproportionately spent by the NHS on provision of care for individuals who consciously refuse to cease smoking. Progressive (year on year) restrictions on access to free treatment for conditions unambiguously related to the deliberate act of smoking would both promote a healthier lifestyle and allow for the reallocation of this proportion of funding into areas of need such as breast cancer treatment and care of elderly.
